channel.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've been out of this PS game for a long time now. My username on here back then was "De Dust89" but I can't figure out the password or email lol.. =/.
Just wondering, I used to LOVE the delta 317 source. I couldn't count how many servers I made based off of clean delta sources. They were so easy to make and literally EVERYONE used to use them. Back then it was less about programming experience and more about creativity in the actual game you were making because there was always a million people there to help on the programming side of things - practically everyone used the same server source, so, it was easy to help.
I'm just wondering now, does anyone still run that delta 317 source? I was just browsing around the forum taking in all the nostalgia and I noticed a lot of PI server sources but no delta? It did have a lot of flaws, so I wouldn't be surprised if everyone found a new path. One major flaw was its efficiency. There was always a bunch of unneeded code that would make the games lag terribly.
Anyways let me know if anyone is still playing with that source! I'd love to hear about it.

item.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

stfu I have helped Oper the greatest server to ever be created.

item.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Project Rainbow is the only server AFAIK that still uses Delta. It won’t last more than 6 hours.

Over the break I was gonna port content over to a different base but I was far too lazy.

item.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:46, topic:554133”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=673056.msg4504423#msg4504423 date=1455502017]

You idiots have probably been on these forums for years , but in all these years none of You can even make a server that obtains 10% of the playerbase mines did. It’s tragic

dude this is incredibly arrogant and ignorant to say

there are people on here that, without this forum, wouldn’t be majoring in computer science or wouldn’t have landed themselves a high paying computer science related job. and you’re comparing that to some terrible looking server that everyone in this thread is making fun of? fuck off

get yourself checked out bro, you genuinely have issues
[/quote]

You can’t make fun of another server that was more successful than any trash you people have ever made. So I don’t take you people seriously. Until somebody creates something half as unique or popular as mine, I won’t give a shit what you have to say for yourself.

Why you all are still trying to convinse me that you kids have any knowledge in this area, when none of you even created servers worth mentioning… I’m sorry to say but “flawless switching” and “perfect woodcutting” is not unique you frauds…[/quote]

Give me a list of your unique features. You know, for my amusement. Try to make it at least 50, so I can have a chuckle while on the toilet.

Read full topic

item.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

Welliton_inc:

it was creative as fudge.

boring poo poo

[spoiler]

Welliton_inc:

You can’t call other servers “poo poo” when you have never made a server to pull more than 2 players.

Welliton_inc:

me and you both know your 718+ leeched generic junk never pulled 2 players.

Welliton_inc:

Still never released a server that has ever obtained a playerbase of over 2.

InfiniteDestiny 718 new realse! amazing content!

You’re nothing but a scrub who cannot make a server that cannot even generate a playerbase greater than 2.

MoparScape / RSPS

Whoever said 718+ is a 12 year old scum

Looking for a type of server

All you see now are non-unique pre-EOC junk hosted by 12 yr old owners w/ an overdeveloped sense of authority.

Post Mortem 718! New Server!

You’re basically a 12 year old kid with a boosted sense of authority.

★ Zelix | Instant-PK & Trained | Amazing Combat | Strong Eco-PK ★

the owners are really just 12 year old kids with a sense of authority who have no clue how to code

Remove Pl0x

HD graphics ruins the purpose of OS. You should never associate OS RuneScape with higher revision graphics. This is basically just a pre-EoC server. Younger players who didn’t play RuneScape back in the day obviously don’t understand the importance of the graphics being SD.

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:3, topic:553354”]This just ruins the purpose of OS. It is meant to be 317 graphics. Not this pre-EoC thing. I understand younger players who never played RuneScape back in the day are not used to the simplicity of the SD graphics, but don’t bring that junk into OS.

Simply because of the graphics alone I definitely would not support this.[/quote]

what do you even do all day
[/spoiler]

Read full topic

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:34, topic:554133”][quote author=Death Style link=topic=673056.msg4504397#msg4504397 date=1455483767]

The bold shows you never played my server. How about you yourself create something half as unique and successful as my server before. You mind showing me the trash you’ve ever created or are you another one of the salty butthurt kids who are all talk but have never actually made a successful server in your life?

your server looks like poo poo but I will say it’s disingenuous to call yourself a webdev when you don’t know javascript
[/quote]

You can’t call other servers “poo poo” when you have never made a server to pull more than 2 players. So how about you stop talking and make something that somebody gives a shit about…

You idiots have probably been on these forums for years , but in all these years none of You can even make a server that obtains 10% of the playerbase mines did. It’s tragic[/quote]

And in those years most of us have made notable contributions, contributions that idiots like you will download, slightly modify, host, and then brag about the player base. Its actually pretty ironic once you think about it.

item.title: Is anyone still using Delta sources these days?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:27, topic:554133”][quote author=M G T link=topic=673056.msg4504369#msg4504369 date=1455453714]

Not that I know of. There’s probably some being hosting from some kids’ bedrooms here and there for like 2 hours a day when he gets home from school, but that’s all I could imagine.

Stupid post. You imagined wrong, stupid.

still autistic i see

Still never released a server that has ever obtained a playerbase of over 2. Come back when somebody plays the shit you upload.

Tens of thousands of people played the shit I ran and I can confirm that Jason is probably ten times the programmer you’ll ever be with that attitude. So now someone who knows what they’re doing has told you to be quiet, will you? Of course not. People like you will never stay quiet and that’s why people like you will never be liked or desired in a group.

I don’t intend to be in any “group” on this site. As far as i’m concerned you’re all little 16 year olds who think you’re funny when in reality you all just sound like the biggest freaks. I’m here because I like to view the unique content that certain people have created. When idiots, such as yourself, post stupid things on threads related to topics like this, I have to respond because you don’t have a clue what the hell you’re talking about.

I can program, am I as good as whoever “jason” is, probably not. But you know what, I am 100% more creative that you fools will ever be, sorry.

As important as each are Creativity > Performance every day of the week, baby. Therefore don’t say controversial stupid shit on threads like this because this is my area of expertise, not yours. You don’t see me saying controversial shit on the programming threads, so keep your ass over to that section.

Where is your creativity, i can’t see it, lare has contributed so much to the community, wbu? ow8. Hold Lare’s L.
All i’m seeing is you host ugly shit like this and then you shut it down 9 days later because no1 played.

[/quote]

What you are seeing right there was a semi-successful server pulling 20+ that was ended due to me having university. You are a stupid fool. The server is undoubtedly more unique than any shit you, or anybody else has made who is trying to debate with me ever made. You mind showing me the shit you may have created so I can slaughter the advertisement thread? Ofcourse not, because me and you both know your 718+ leeched generic junk never pulled 2 players.

I know you’re just saying it’s not creative because you’re probably bumbuddies with everyone, but everyone knows the server was unique and creative, hence why it pulled the playerbase it did. So how about you take that L and learn how to run a successful server k?

EDIT: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,653198.msg4379353.html#msg4379353 you seriously better shut your mouth before you speak because this is the most generic leeched piece of trash server with no uniqueness whatsoever. My server literally takes a dump on that trash sorry buddy.[/quote]
are you seriously suggesting your turd base 437 is more creative than MGTScape, an internationally renowned 718 server competing even with jagex themselves? you need to take a good look at yourself before u criticise others, i played your “20+” server and what can i say it was complete wank, dragons outside every door in varrock and shit ladders that don’t even work.

Read full topic
